Containers.Name: binhex-hexchat
Containers.Description: [b]Description[/b][br] HexChat is an IRC client based on XChat, but unlike XChat it’s completely free for both Windows and Unix-like systems. Since XChat is open source, it’s perfectly legal. For more info. HexChat was originally called XChat-WDK which in turn was a successor of freakschat.[br][br] [b]Configuration[/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where the application will store its configuration files, database and logs etc.[br][br] [b]Documentation[/b][br] https://github.com/binhex/documentation[br][br]
